name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程目的在訓練學生(1)閱讀英文報紙的技巧，(2)聽英語新聞的眳敏銳聽力，並(3)啟發學生針對新聞作英語分析及思辨的反思能力。自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞媒體教材, 在課堂上解讀分析新聞本身的涵意後，討論與其相關之延伸議題，以培養學生獨立思考與判斷的思辨能力。
schedule:
Topic One: News on medical discoveries (I)
Week 1  The Anti-biotics
Week 2  The World of Micro-cosom.
Week 3  Digestion System
Week 4  Headaches
Topic Two: News on wars and cultural conflicts
Week 5  Gold in South Africa
Week 6  Problems in Afghanistan
Week 7  Isreal
Week 8  Iraq and Iran
Topic Three:  Midterm oral presentation
Week 9 Oral presentation of Midterm project
Topic Four: News on Medicine (II)
Week 10  Breast Cancer I
Week 11  Breast Cancer II
Week 12  Breast Cancer III
Week 13  AIDS
Topic Five: News on international business and global corporations
Week 14 India
Week 15 China
Week 16 Latin America
Week 17 South Asia
Topic Six:  Oral Presentation of final projects
Week 18  Presentation
scorePolicy:
1. In class presentation:Oral presentations 5% X 10 = 50%
2. Midterm presentation: 25%
3. Final Presentation: 25%
materials:
1. The New York Times (every Monday), United Daily Newspaper.
2. Reading News
